casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
PINEDA S244451 Supreme Court of California DECEMBER 13, 2017 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The People's petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in People v. Mendoza, S241647 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court. Defendant's petition for review is denied.
